alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:49PM PST until February 23 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Cascade Foothills in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow will likely occur later this evening through early Thursday morning. May see lingering snow showers Thursday morning but less accumulation expected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
